    Advocate - Tapan Kumar Bhattacharya
resNameAdd:
1) Moniruz Zaman and 2 others
    Advocate - Rajarshi Dasgupta

business_details.Business: Appearance of accused person with bailor.

Accused Monirul Zaman has been produced from the jail hajot.Seen the accused Accused Kalam and Rasida Khatun have appeared with a ptn. vide nO. 1935/19 and 1936/19 praying for previous bail. Seen the pt. Vide Ptn. 1937/19 it has stated showing cause of absence of the bailor of the accused Rashida Khatu. Vide Ptn. 1938/19 it has been stated showing the cause of absenec of the bailor of Kalam. Seen both the ptn. Perused the case record. Considering all prayer for previous bail is accepted. Remand the accused till 04-12-2019. Seen the B.P vide No. 1925/19 and rejected. Fixing 04-12-2019 for C/C and Production of bailor of Kalam and Rashida.
Accused are present. charge framed. copy furnished.Fixing 18-12-2019 for evidence.

Accused Rashida Khatun and Abul Kalam Azad are present. Accused Monirul Islam is absent with steps vide Ptn. No witness is present. Issued summon to witness Sahida Khatun and Rupsana Begum returned duly served, but not present. Issue B/W/A of Rs. 500/ against the said witnesses.Fixing 03-01-2020 for evidence.

Accused persons are present. By filing ptn. vide NO. 15/2020 engaged counsel of the accused Monirul Islam submitted certified copy of order dated 17-12-2019 passed by Honble Gauhait high court in connection with GR case No. 949/2019. Perused case record. Fixing 09-01-2020 for appearance.
Accused Monirul Jamal and Abdul Kalam are present. Accused Rashida Khatun is absent with steps 70/2020. Fixing 21-01-2020 for necessary oder

Accused Moniruzzaman alias Monirul Islam is absent with steps vide Ptn. No. 119/2020 shown cause of absence which is seen and allowed. Accused Rashida Khatun is absent with steps vide Ptn. 118/2020 shown cause of absence which is seen and allowed. Accused Abul Kalam is present. Fixing 01-02-2020 for necessary order.

Accused Rashida Bibi is absent with steps with steps vide Ptn. No.201/2020 shown cause of absence. Which is seen and allowed. Rest two accused persons are present. Fixing 07-02-2020 for necessary order.
Accused Abul Kalam is absent with steps vide ptn. NO. 249/2020 shown cause of absence. Which is seen . Rest two accused persons are present. Fixing 17-02-2020 for N.o

Accused Abul Kalam and Moniruzzaman are absent with steps vide Ptn. No. 333/2020 shown cause of absence. Which is seen and allowed. Accused Rashida Khatun is absent with steps vide Ptn. No.332/2020 shown cause of absence. Which is seen and allowed. Fixing 27-02-2020 for N.O
CR Put up today as P.O is on CL
Cr Put up today as P.O is on CL

Case is adjourned today as a preventive measure to fight against the outbreak of Novel Corona Virus (COVID-19). Also no hazira (attendance) / petition are also placed by the concerned accused/petitioner/O.P. or learned counsel in this case as Lockdown has been imposed all over.
